baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，見新受戒比丘，應起迎逆、恭敬、禮拜、問訊、請與坐。不者，除因緣，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 175

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼見比丘。不起不禮不請坐。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 179

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。見比丘來不起。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 103
